thread.title: New Report Published: Vietnam Visa Online Service for Tourist and Business
thread.title_full: New Report Published: Vietnam Visa Online Service for Tourist and Business

author: prbuzz.com
title: New Report Published: Vietnam Visa Online Service for Tourist and Business
text:
The website VietnamsVisa.com now offers all-in-one guide on Visa On Arrival to assist those who are looking for such information. VietnamsVisa further elaborates the process of applying for a visa on arrival.
September 10th, 2015 -- According to Vietnamsvisa, Visa on arrival is the process wherein an interested individual can apply for a visa online , the processed approval letter will be sent to you through an email, you only need to take it along when you arrive at Hanoi or Ho Chi Minh Airports in Vietnam, and they will support you in getting the suitable visa stamped on your passport. Once issued, this is accurately the same visa as issued by a Vietnam Embassy or Consulate, with similar limitations and conditions for using.
Applicants may run into some difficulties while applying for Vietnam Visa at Embassy;
• Parting with your original passport
• Having to drive to nearby embassies or transferring documents by mail
• Vietnam embassy may be excessively far-off from your place of residence
Advantages of Visa On Arrival over Visa at Embassy
• No need to send your original passport away
• Taking only a short time to apply for a visa on arrival online, the thing you need is a computer with internet connection
• No dealing with immigration authorities. VietnamsVisa transacts with them on your behalf.
• Exclusively convenient for those who are presently staying far away from available Embassies
• The process of applying for a visa on arrival is rather simple and forthright. Most agencies clarify at excessive details how to get one on arrival and all agencies follow similar process so you will not be confused.
• Visa on arrival saves both time and money - specifically if you need one urgently.
• All done online – visa booking, payment making and getting the approval letter via internet.
Applicants are advised to Apply for Visa On Arrival only at qualified providers such as Vietnamsvisa .
Their services include a complimentary meet and greet assistance; their representative will meet you and will handle all your documentation. Since you’re paying for the Immigration landing fees with them you don’t need to worry about carrying foreign exchange to pay for the same in Vietnam.
Reasons to apply through VietnamsVisa are also provided:
• Working at the utmost accountability: VietnamsVisa cares for their customer's entry until they exit Vietnam safely;
• Dedicated, trustworthy and reliable manners: They build their reputation from outstanding services. Having customer's self-reliance is their paramount priority;
• Timely processing: Time is the most important factor in their visa processing policy. VietnamsVisa makes complete use of every minute to complete customer's visa, specifically in the urgent circumstances;
• Fast and secured services
• Competitive price
• Timely processing
• English speaking support
• Clients focused approach
• 100% money back guarantee
For more information please visit the website at www.vietnamsvisa.com .
